title: 6.13 Patching Problems
body: anyone else get the "unspecified error, please check the logs for more information" pop-up? My patcher is at the Scanning files phase and it cant make it out. ive uninstalled and re-installed about 12 times in attempts of trying different methods to fix it, but nothing seems to work.. please help rito.

replies.body:
Failure during the "scanning files" step is usually caused by League not being assigned proper system permissions. You can find common solutions for this on our [Permissions guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if those steps helped.

i tried all of the guides and it still did not work, and when i try to delete the file "lol_air_client" all i get is the error message saying "error 0x80070091" and when i looked up guides to fix that, it says to type a command into cmd. so i did and when the "repairing{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  C: drive" finished after 1 hour, i started my computer again and tried to delete the files. and i was simply greeted with the error message again, i think that would be part of my problem, but as stated i tried everything in your guide and nothing worked.
